backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, game CRUD operations with creator authorization, and access control integration using mixins for blob storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the default route configuration to navigate to /math is implemented in frontend/src/App.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, styles, and configuration, describing the dark-themed educational AI platform with math solver, chat, media generation, translation, music, art, code, and games features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme CSS variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph tags, Twitter Card tags, canonical URL, JSON-LD structured data for WebApplication schema, and PWA manifest link for Nexora AI platform.
frontend/public/demo.html: Standalone interactive demo page with dark theme styling, tabbed navigation interface, and embedded CSS using OKLCH color variables for showcasing Neroxa AI features.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining Neroxa AI app metadata, standalone display mode, dark theme colors, and icon configurations for 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all user agents to crawl all paths on the site.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all main application routes (home, chat, math, media, translation, music, art, code, games) with priorities and update frequencies for SEO.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application entry point that sets up React Query, TanStack Router with routes for all features (chat, math, media, translator, music, art, code, games), and wraps the app with InternetIdentityProvider and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Interactive drawing canvas component with color palette, brush size controls, eraser tool, AI art idea generator chat, and artwork sharing/download functionality.
frontend/src/components/ChatPage.tsx: Chat page container that manages routing between chat sessions, renders ChatSidebar and ChatView, and handles session selection and navigation.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar displaying chat session list with timestamps, new chat button, and session selection functionality using useChatSessions hook.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Chat interface component that displays messages for a specific session, handles user input with textarea, sends messages, and shows typing indicators with auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches and displays errors with a styled error card, showing error details and providing reset/reload options.
frontend/src/components/GameBrowser.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable grid of games with tabs for all/user/AI-created games, supporting game playback and deletion for owners. Uses React Query hooks to fetch games and manages game player modal state.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Renders an individual game card with thumbnail, title, description, creator badge (AI/User), and a play button. Includes hover effects and click handlers for game playback.
frontend/src/components/GameModeModal.ts: Modal dialog presenting three options: play built-in games, browse community games, or create a new game. Uses shadcn/ui Dialog component with icon buttons for each mode.
frontend/src/components/GamePlayer.tsx: Full-screen game player component that loads game code into an iframe, handles high scores via postMessage, and includes built-in templates for Snake and Flappy Bird. Supports fullscreen mode and displays creator info.
frontend/src/components/GameStudio.tsx: Game creation interface with form fields for title, description, and HTML/CSS/JS code. Validates input, creates games via mutation hook, and navigates to game browser on success.
frontend/src/components/GamesView.tsx: Paginated game catalogue view with search, filtering (all/user/AI), and pagination controls. Displays games in a grid and manages game player modal state.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, theme toggle (light/dark), user profile display, and sign-out button. Uses Internet Identity authentication and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: React component for solving math problems with step-by-step explanations, difficulty levels (K-2 through 11-12), teacher mode for concept explanations, and a homework helper chat interface.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: React component with tabbed interface for generating AI images and videos from text prompts, displaying generated media in a grid, and showing upload progress.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: React component for AI music generation from text prompts and a beat pattern sequencer with kick/snare/hihat sounds, tempo control, playback, and music sharing functionality.
frontend/src/components/PredefinedGameSe: Dialog component displaying a grid of predefined classic games (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, Breakout) with emoji icons and descriptions for instant game selection.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog component for first-time user profile setup, collecting the user's name and initializing their game stats (gamesPlayed, totalScore) using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/Scripter.tsx: Chat-style React component for generating code snippets from natural language descriptions, with message history, copy-to-clipboard functionality, and keyboard shortcuts.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: React component that displays shared artwork or music content by ID, fetching from backend hooks and showing loading/error states with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: Translation chat interface component with language selection dropdowns, message history display, and input area for translating text between 10 supported languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor instance, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Hook that generates art prompt suggestions based on user input keywords (animals, landscapes, abstract, portraits, fantasy, space, flowers, food), returning randomized creative ideas for each category.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: Hook for sharing artwork by generating a local artwork ID and providing URL copy functionality; backend sharing is no longer supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Hook that generates simple synthesized audio melodies using Web Audio API based on text prompts, converting AudioBuffer to WAV blobs and managing generation state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Hook managing HTML canvas drawing state and operations including mouse/touch drawing, color/brush size control, eraser mode, and canvas clearing with white background initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Manages chat sessions using localStorage instead of backend, providing queries and mutations for loading sessions, adding messages, and creating new sessions with bigint timestamp handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameCatalogue.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching game catalogue data, individual game metadata, categories, and games by category from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on games (get all, get single, create, delete) using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Manages game high scores using localStorage with React Query hooks for retrieving and updating high scores per game ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication with React context, providing login/logout functionality, identity management, and auth client configuration with delegation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Simulates AI image and video generation by creating canvas-based placeholder media with gradient backgrounds and text overlays, managing generation state and history.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: Provides music sharing functionality that generates local music IDs and share URLs, though backend persistence is no longer supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useScriptGeneration.t: Simulates AI script generation by creating mock code snippets (React, Python, JavaScript, API, calculator) based on user requests with conversation history management.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching shared artwork and music content, though both features throw errors as backend support has been removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Custom React hook that manages translation state and provides mock translation functionality with support for common greetings and thanks phrases in 12 languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles via the backend actor, with toast notifications and automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens defining a dark theme with teal primary colors, coral accents, and sidebar styling using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name composition.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/templates/flappyBirdTemplat: Complete HTML/CSS/JavaScript template for a Flappy Bird game with sprite rendering, collision detection, and score tracking.
frontend/src/utils/errorLogger.ts: Centralized error logging utility with severity levels (info, warning, error, critical) that maintains a rolling log buffer and outputs to console.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter utilities for extracting query parameters from both regular and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH colors, animations, container queries, and typography plugin integration.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, architectural notes, and a pending request to set the math problem solver as the default landing route.
